game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    final class Game
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Form for playing the actual game. Temporary class used for visually designing the GUI.
    Author:
    blackk100

    • Field Detail

      • initVars

        private final boolean[] initVars
        Round Initialization Variables: 
         I-----------I-----------I-----------I
 I Index No. I   false   I    true   I
 I-----------I-----------I-----------I
 I     0     I  10 x 10  I  15 x 15  I
 I-----------I-----------------------I
 I     1     I       Battleship      I
 I     2     I        Cruiser        I
 I     3     I       Destroyer       I
 I     4     I        Corvette       I
 I-----------I-----------------------I

      • mode

        private final java.lang.String mode
        Game Mode: 
         C - Classic
 S - Salvo

      • boardSize

        private final int boardSize
        An integer show the length of the grid. if initVars[0] is true, boardSize is 15. Else 10.

      • shipNos

        private int shipNos
        Total number of ships available in this match.

      • AIDiff

        private final int AIDiff
        AI Difficulty: 
         -1 - Sandbox   (Easy)
  0 - Realistic (Medium)
  1 - Brutal    (Hard)

      • AI

        private AI AI
        The AI. Uses Grid 2.

      • PlayerGridL

        private Location[][] PlayerGridL
        The Player's Grid as a 2-Dimensional Location Array.

        private Location[][] AIGridL
        The AI's Grid as a 2-Dimensional Location Array.

        private Ship[] PlayerShips
        The Player's ships.

      • AIShips

        private Ship[] AIShips
        The AI's ships.

      • PlayerStats

        private int[] PlayerStats
        The Player's Statistics: 
         I-----------I-----------------------I
 I Index No. I    Value Stored       I
 I-----------I-----------------------I
 I     0     I Shots Fired  (SF)     I
 I     1     I Hits landed  (Hits)   I
 I     2     I Ships Lost   (SL)     I
 I-----------I-----------------------I

      • AIStats

        private int[] AIStats
        The AI's Statistics: 
         I-----------I-----------------------I
 I Index No. I    Value Stored       I
 I-----------I-----------------------I
 I     0     I Shots Fired  (SF)     I
 I     1     I Hits landed  (Hits)   I
 I     2     I Ships Lost   (SL)     I
 I-----------I-----------------------I

      • roundNo

        private int roundNo
        Internal counter for current game/match round/sequence. 
         -1  - Game Ended
 0   - Ship Placement
 > 0 - Actual Game (until it ends).

      • status

        private int status
        An integer indicating whether or not the given round was won by the user. 
         1 - Win
 2 - Lose

      • buttonsClicked

        private boolean[][] buttonsClicked
        Variable for storing the state of each button (i.e., clicked or not) for each round. 
         true  - Clicked
 false - Not Clicked
        s

      • shotsSelected

        private int shotsSelected
        Temporary variable for storing the number locations selected for placing shots. Used after the Ship Placement round.

      • shipPlacing

        private int shipPlacing
        Temporary variable for storing the number of ships placed. Only used during the Ship Placement round.

      • initLoc

        int[] initLoc
        Temporary variable for storing the coordinates of the button clicked of the ship's initial point. Only used during the Ship Placement round. 0 : X-Coordinate 1 : Y-Coordinate

      • finalLoc

        int[] finalLoc
        Temporary variable for storing the coordinates of the button clicked of the ship's final point. Only used during the Ship Placement round. 0 : X-Coordinate 1 : Y-Coordinate

      • direction

        boolean direction
        Temporary variable for storing the direction of the ship placement. Only used during the Ship Placement round. 
         true  : Vertical
 false : Horizontal

      • initGrid

        private java.lang.Object[] initGrid(int boardSize,
                                    boolean gridNo)
        Initializes the buttons for Grid gridNo.
        Parameters:
        boardSize - Size of Game Board
        gridNo - Whether it's the 1st Grid or 2nd Grid
        Returns:
        An object array containing the JButton and Location arrays of gridNo.

      • initComponents

        private void initComponents()
        This method is called from within the constructor to initialize the form. WARNING: Do NOT modify this code. The content of this method is always regenerated by the Form Editor.

      • end

        private void end()
        What to do match completion. Also makes any undamaged enemy ships visible.

      • Exit

        private void Exit(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Exits to the main menu.
        Parameters:
        evt - Button Click

      • NextRound

        private void NextRound(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        If match ended, go to Post. If ship placement, setup player ships, enemy AI, and AI ships. If user shot, checks if user has won. If the user has won, set match to have ended. If the user hasn't won, the AI shoots and checks if the AI has won. If the AI has won, set match to have ended. If neither the user nor the AI have won, advances the game to the next round.
        Parameters:
        evt - Button Click

      • Help

        private void Help(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        A series of JOptionPane.MessageDialog-s for explaining the game.
        Parameters:
        evt - Button Click

      • ShipCBClicked

        private void ShipCBClicked(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Sets all ShipP CheckBoxes to their desired state every time one of them is clicked. Also called during the constructor.
        Parameters:
        evt - Button Click

      • Clear

        private void Clear(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
        Clears the alerts/notifications text area.
        Parameters:
        evt - Button Click

      • placeShip

        private void placeShip(javax.swing.JButton button,
                       boolean direction)
        Used for placing ships.
        Parameters:
        button - JButton which was clicked.
        direction - Orientation of the Ship to be placed. true: Vertical ; false: Horizontal

      • fire

        private void fire(javax.swing.JButton button)
        Manages what to do if a button was clicked.
        Parameters:
        button - JButton which was clicked

      • fireAI

        private void fireAI()
        Function for handling the AI input.

      • nextShip

        private int nextShip()
        Determines which ship to place next, since ships can be removed from the grid. Returns the number of ships if all ships have been placed.
        Returns:
        an integer equivalent to the ship number to be placed.

      • extractCoordinates

        private int[] extractCoordinates(java.lang.String coords)
        Extracts the X- and Y-Coordinates form the Grid JButton action command String format: grid_no x_coordinate y_coordinate
        Parameters:
        coords - Coordinates of the Button
        Returns:
        An integer array of 2 integers. 1st integer is X-Coordinate. 2nd integer is Y-Coordinate.
